summary: Fourteen-year-old Jason Shepherd has a reputation for stretching the truth. So, when big-time Hollywood producer Marty Wolf steals his class paper and turns it into a smash hit movie, no one believes Jason's latest tall tale.
cast: Frankie Muniz|Paul Giamatti|Amanda Bynes|Amanda Detmer|Donald Faison|Sandra Oh|Russell Hornsby|Michael Bryan French|Christine Tucci|Lee Majors|Sean O'Bryan|Amy Hill|John Cho|Matthew Frauman|Don Yesso|Rebecca Corry|Sparkle|Taran Killam|Alexandra Breckenridge|Ned Brower|John Gatins|Andre Rosey Brown|Steven Shenbaum|Jake Miner|Ted Rooney|Marisa Petroro|Randall Newsome|Michelle Griffin|Mike Smith|Andrea Sevilla|Pamela Paulshock|Erik Stabenau|Tracey Cherelle Jones|Pat O'Brien|Brian Turk|Sandra Lee Gimpel|Tim Haldeman|Patrick Falls|Timmy Fitzpatrick|Corinne Reilly|Shawn Levy|Dustin Diamond|Bart Myer|Kenan Thompson|Kanan Hooker|Houston Hooker|C.J. Picerni|Kyle Swann|Jaleel White|Greg Bronson|John Eric Brown|Mike Holman|Martin Klebba|Natalia Livingston
title: Big Fat Liar (Gordo mentiroso)
